title: Get Started
coursesPitchText: Star your favorite courses and keep updated. Add new courses to share them with your classmates.
materialsPitchText: Find the top study materials easily. Add new materials to courses.
discussionPitchText: Discuss courses and materials easily. Appear as anonymous or with your account.
scorePitchText: Increase your score by adding great content. Praise your profile to your friends.
